programme.desc: 《中國深度財經》: 節目以上海為據點, 全面、深入探討中國內地經濟發展狀況, 從而讓世界更準確地了解中國、了解上海。

programme.desc: 《鳳凰焦點新聞》: 聚焦重大時政議題, 重大社會事件和新聞熱點, 原創性挖掘更多時事與背景, 分析梳理新聞的前因後果, 人物命運, 呈現權威觀點。

programme.title: 問答神州
programme.desc: 《問答神州》: 致力採訪兩岸四地的關鍵人物, 與政壇精英進行高端對話。觀眾將可第一時間掌握中國的最新變化和發展, 將眼光投向快速增長的中國經濟、改革轉型中的大時代。

programme.title: 時事直通車
programme.desc: 《時事直通車》: 節目專門網羅國際重大事件和其他集錦新聞、聚焦大陸、台灣及香港的要聞時事。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 2200
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 新聞今日談
programme.desc: 《新聞今日談》: 節目針對當天最熱門時事問題, 在觀眾最關注的時刻即時作出評論, 讓觀眾更洞悉事件的真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 2300

programme.title: 新聞鑒證組
programme.desc: 《新聞鑒證組》: 捕捉虛假新聞, 追溯資源源頭與發布者, 調查發布者的背景和可信度, 核查資訊內容與發布動機。破解新聞中不實的報導, 還原新聞事件真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Erica Hill explores the future of Venice, a city threatened by rising sea levels and the more immediate threat of overwhelming tourism. She speaks with locals working to preserve the city's traditions and address climate change.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper: Luke Bryan: Grief, Faith, and Music
programme.desc: Luke Bryan is one of country music's biggest stars. He's also faced great loss. In this personal and revealing conversation with Anderson, Luke shares how faith, family, and music have helped him "do what you do to get through.".

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS: Fareed Zakaria GPS: Disconnected: Life in a Disruptive Digital Age
programme.desc: With 20% of Americans feeling lonely every day and the number of people without close friends having quadrupled over the past 35 years, Fareed Zakaria examines how the digital age is reshaping the very fabric of human connection.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper: Adaptation Nation: A Climate Crisis Survival Guide
programme.desc: From the hurricane-afflicted Gulf Coast to the fire-ravaged mountains of California, communities are rebuilding in the face of disaster. CNN's Bill Weir explores the lessons learned and how we can adapt to a changing climate.

programme.title: Amanpour: Thant Myint; Werner Herzog; Arundhati Roy
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with historian Thant Myint-U about his book "Peacemaker", documenting the life of his grandfather U Thant, who as UN Secretary-General in the 1960s became a pivotal player in resolving wars around the world. Also on the show today: legendary filmmaker Werner Herzog speaks with Christiane about his recent non-fiction book, "The Future of Truth", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with no

programme.title: Blueprint: Blueprint: Mongolia
programme.desc: Many people travel to Mongolia to disconnect, to escape into the vast wilderness and switch off. But for Mongolians, connectivity is everything. The country has 3.5 million people and 5 million active phone numbers. Everywhere you look in the capital city Ulaanbaatar, people are glued to their phones. A vibrant startup scene in the city is driving innovation and diversifying Mongolia's economy bey

programme.title: Global Perspectives: Global Perspectives: On Africa
programme.desc: Hosted by Zain Asher, this special half-hour program showcases the best of CNN's inaugural "Global Perspectives: On Africa" event, featuring interviews and session highlights with high profile political and business leaders, innovators and thought-leaders.

programme.title: POV: POV: Edo
programme.desc: POV?travels away from well-worn tourist trails to discover the country's essence through the lens of its people. Meet those who dedicate their lives to safeguarding the culture through art, food, and more, and how these facets co-exist within modern culture today.

programme.title: The Journey Matters: The Philippines
programme.desc: Travel and tourism to the Philippines surpassed pre-pandemic levels in 2024. Visitors now focus on authentic and sustainable experiences that preserve traditions, the environment and support local communities.

programme.title: Amanpour: Thant Myint; Werner Herzog; Arundhati Roy

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第3集
programme.desc: AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第7集
programme.desc: Gina Goetter is the CFO and COO of Hasbro. She's the architect of the company's transformation, diversifying its manufacturing footprint and investing in Hasbro's video game ambitions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Screentime: The Business Of Pop Culture
programme.desc: At Screentime, the icons and innovators behind today's entertainment revolution take the stage. The agenda: AI's creative takeover, the streaming wars, and what's next for legacy media.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Best Of The Bloomberg Women, Money & Power Event
programme.desc: Highlights of the event which brings together the most influential female voices in finance from around the world to discuss the biggest themes facing the future of business.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第2集
programme.desc: Alex and Jason sit down with Mellody Hobson, co-CEO and president of Ariel Investments, to discuss her firm's newly launched fund, 'Project Level,' devoted to investing in women's sports.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第3集
programme.desc: The Commanders DC Deal with Josh Harris. 26North founder and Washington Commanders owner Josh Harris talks about the team's recent stadium deal in DC and his mindset on team ownership.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第8集
programme.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex. Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

programme.title: The Circuit 第4季第2集
programme.desc: Emily meets Snap CEO Evan Spiegel in Los Angeles for a conversation about his entrepreneurial journey, building Snap and his latest consumer hardware bet.

programme.title: The Circuit 第4季第3集
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Alexis Ohanian at Athlos NYC, an annual women's track and field event. They discuss his athletics portfolio, venture career and what really happened when he left Reddit.

programme.title: The Circuit 第4季第4集
programme.desc: Emily meets Reese Witherspoon and the Hello Sunshine executive team to discuss the company's founding mission and what's next for Hollywood.

programme.title: The Circuit 第4季第5集 -Dana Walden, Disney Entertainment Co
programme.desc: Emily meets Disney Entertainment Co-Chair Dana Walden and a cast of Disney stars for an inside look at the entertainment giant's global streaming and TV operations.

programme.title: Can't Look Away: The Case Against Social Media
programme.desc: The documentary explores the real-life cases handled by the Social Media Victims Law Center, which assists parents of children who have died as a result of harmful internet activities.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Is Europe Too Late To Compete In The Chip War?
programme.desc: Bloomberg hosts a debate taking a close look at Europe's role in the global chip race. Hosted by Caroline Hyde. In partnership with Open to Debate.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: A weekly show on fixed income with the biggest names in the field, covering sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick, Alix Steel and Scarlet Fu break down the day's top stories and trading action around the close.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: What'd You Miss?
programme.desc: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.desc: Francine Lacqua interviews some of the most influential people on the planet.

programme.desc: Former baseball pro Alex Rodriguez quietly built a real estate empire over 20 years. Now, after retiring from baseball, he's accelerating his transformation from former athlete to investor and owner.
